h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Venom Daoist
content: At the end of this fight, you can potentially receive the Venomous Armguard, but you'll need to approach the fight in a specific way to achieve this. The Venom Daoist has 6 arms on his back, and you'll need to break the bottom 4 for him to drop the armguards. If you kill him before doing this, he won't drop anything. Use the lowest damage weapon that you have, and focus your attacks on his back. If you're having trouble with it, use Immobolize to keep him still.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_4_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Venom Daoist' and the sub-subsection 'Warning: Missable Gear!'.
The content is as follows:
At the end of this fight, you can potentially receive the Venomous Armguard, but you'll need to approach the fight in a specific way to achieve this. The Venom Daoist has 6 arms on his back, and you'll need to break the bottom 4 for him to drop the armguards. If you kill him before doing this, he won't drop anything. Use the lowest damage weapon that you have, and focus your attacks on his back. If you're having trouble with it, use Immobolize to keep him still.
